name: Hearthborn Mask
description: A midnight blue soft leather headpiece with copper stitchwork, hides a thin inner pocket for letters; saved for nights when music runs late.

name: Robe of Hearthborn
description: A brick red raw silk garment finished with simple whipstitch. It carries old stains that never quite lift and is meant to impress without shouting.

name: Boots of Hearthborn
description: Footwear in moss green hand‑loomed hemp with copper stitchwork. It breathes better than it looks and is favored by caravan hands and ferry keepers.

name: Fieldhand's Headwrap
description: A river‑blue hand‑loomed hemp headpiece with frayed tassels, breathes better than it looks; meant to impress without shouting.

name: Boots of Fieldhand's
description: Footwear in ember orange dyed linen with obsidian beads. It is surprisingly quiet when you move and is stitched to move quietly through crowded halls.
